properties.address: Tintagel Social Hall, Tintagel, Tintagel PL34 0AB
properties.description: Community hall offering hot meals and hot/cold drinks. Heated . Car parking. Disabled toilets/access. We also provide food and essentials free of charge
properties.title: Tintagel Social Hall

properties.description: Open to all. We are open Monday 9am till 4 pm providing a roast lunch from 11.30am. Friday afternoons it’s 1.30 till 4 with afternoon tea. Both are free of charge
properties.title: Tintagel Social Hall Warm Welcome

properties.description: The church rooms are open to all on Thursday mornings. A
